item.title: Mutations
item.description: I’ve been thinking a lot about a campaign with a body horror angle. The following table is obviously not going to be suitable for your average game. A game where the players are going in aware of the fact that their character might not make it out totally who they were going in sounds pretty interesting to me though… Roll 1d6/2 on the mutation families and then roll 1d6 on the mutations within that family.
